tags: None
review:
Doctor was very kind to listen to my mother's knee problem in detail. She was in severe knee pain since 15 years and her mobility was very restricted. She was advised knee replacement many times in past but she refused. On visiting Dr. Darsh Goyal at his clinic luckily we met two patients for follow up after knee replacement who were very satisfied and walking normal without any support. My mother talked in detail to them and later Dr. Darsh did my mother both knee replacement and she walked after 24 hours of operation. She has no pain and no difficulty in walking.
Very thankful to him and highly recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: How can a doctor treat without telling you the charges, highly unprofessional,. charges 10k for an injection ** ******
reply_text:
Good Evening Sir

Would like to clarify on your issues.

Your mother was very well aware of the complete package charges as she agreed to it.

The charges are variable for different types of injections ranging from just 50 for intramuscular to 70k for spinal injections.

In your case it was 
Intraarticular and subacromial injection +
Chiropractic joint mobilization procedure + Consultation

The package charges for such procedures range from 5k to 15k. In your case we even gave  2k discount and charged only 8k for everything and only  after complete movement restoration and satisfaction.

Get well soon
Regards
Dr. Darsh Goyal

Experience with the doctor is very good but with the way hospital is running. Long queue, display not getting updated, sales person entering in between doctors cabin , the staff issues slip etc are below average.

review: I went to Dr. Darsh Goyal for lower back pain. I was having this issue from last few months. He gave me minimum required medicines and very well explained exercises to be done. review: My Shoulder pain was so trouble that I could not even sleep at night and was not able to work in kitchen since 1 year. My shoulder was completely stiff and frozen as some doctors said. He gave injection in shoulder and explained exercises and now after 1 year I am lifting my shoulder with no pain. doing all work.Got my life back. Highly recommend him.
